trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded"></xref>, <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdding"></xref>, <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved"></xref>, and <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving"></xref> events.
trans-unit.target: Provides data for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded"></xref>, <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdding"></xref>, <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved"></xref>, and <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving"></xref> events.

trans-unit.source: ComponentEventArgs is the root event arguments class for all component management events.
trans-unit.target: ComponentEventArgs는 모든 구성 요소 관리 이벤트에 대 한 루트 이벤트 인수 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: This type of event occurs when you add or remove components using a designer.
trans-unit.target: 이 유형의 이벤트가 추가 하거나 디자이너를 사용 하는 구성 요소를 제거할 때 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentEventArgs"></xref> class.
The component that is the source of the event.
Gets the component associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트와 관련 된 구성 요소를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The component associated with the event.
